lead.title: Want to run a campaign with Squid?
lead.subtitle: Contact us by form below
lead.name: Name

textRightSide.paragraphOne: Fill in the contact details correctly so that Squid's salesperson can analyze your proposal and we will contact you.
textRightSide.paragraphTwo: Attention: this form is not a direct contact channel with the influencer, but the intention to carry out a campaign with him through the Squid platform.
textRightSide.linkKnowMore: Click here to learn more about Squid.

successMessage.title: Appreciate
successMessage.paragraphOne: Thank you so much for your interest!
successMessage.paragraphTwo: Soon you will have a personalized service from our sales team.
successMessage.knowAboutSquid: Learn more about Squid!
